name: Silence (itch) (Basicallyy)
description:
Join Skyler on her quest to get home!
Stranded in the world of her favorite JPEG Collection, the Sappyseals, the architects of the Pixlverse.

 A Story to discover the roots of the PIXLverse!

A single-player RPG with the Bullethell Battlesystem of Undertale!

Solve the Problems of the Seals, get stronger and decipher the Mysterious plans
of Senor El Gato in this unique RPG!
